message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its true value to be over $12000. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for $15000. This price not only reflects the product's high quality and potential impact but also allows us to cover our costs and ensure sustainable business practices. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.
